=== Nested Lambda Tests ===

Test 1: Lambda returning lambda
add5(3) = 8
add10(3) = 13

Test 2: Counter pattern
counter1: 1
counter1: 2
counter1: 3
counter2: 1
counter2: 2

Test 3: Accumulator factory
acc1(5) = 5
acc1(10) = 15
acc2(5) = 105
acc2(10) = 115

Test 4: Multiple lambdas sharing variable
Initial: 0
After 3 increments: 3
After 1 decrement: 2
After reset: 0

=== All Nested Lambda Tests Complete ===
